titles.title: Expressing the support of the House of Representatives regarding the merits and benefits of the Laundry Environmental Stewardship Program (ESP) program, which improves the environment through textile services industry wide conservation of water and energy, reducing pollutants, and using safer surfactants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 10/6/2009--Introduced. Commends LaundryESP (the Laundry Environmental Stewardship Program) and the textile services industry for their voluntary industry wide commitments to use less water and energy, use more environmentally friendly wash formulas, and significantly reduce pollutants.
